title: West 101 - 1 Bedroom $640 - Pet Friendly
posting_body: The West 101 Building is located at 1415 West 101st Street in Cleveland.
Minutes from the Cudell Rapid Station, 10-15 minutes from Battery Park, Gordon Square, and West 25th.
Landlord pays for water, heat, sewer, trash
Pet Policy: This location accepts cats.
2 pets per unit, $25/pet/month, no pet deposit.
The non refundable application fee is $35 for the first application and $5 for any additional applications, anyone 18 or over who intends to reside in the apartment must submit an application.
We accept cash, check, money order, and debit card.

Applications must be filled out in their entirety and submitted with photo ID and proof of income (last 4 weeks/last 2-4 pay stubs from current job, or if self employed last 3 months of bank statements showing deposits, or if receiving social security this year's letter).
to schedule a tour or for an application.
We have several properties in the neighborhood, at AIY Properties we are confident that we have an apartment that fits your budget and preferences.
